meanings.definition: Inflammation of a nerve or nerves.
meanings.sent1: Neuritis can cause pain and discomfort in the affected area.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed her with neuritis after examining her symptoms.
meanings.sent3: Neuritis decided to visit the doctor to get rid of the inflammation party in his nerves.
meanings.sent4: The neuritis in her arm felt like tiny firecrackers going off inside.
meanings.sent5: The neuritis in his leg felt like a tangled mess of wires sparking with pain.

meanings.definition: Pain, weakness, or numbness resulting from inflammation of a nerve or nerves.
meanings.sent1: She experienced neuritis in her hand, making it difficult to hold things.
meanings.sent2: Neuritis in the foot can make walking very uncomfortable.
meanings.sent3: Neuritis played a prank on her, causing her hand to feel like a numb balloon.
meanings.sent4: The neuritis in his back was a constant reminder of his limits.
meanings.sent5: The sharp neuritis in her shoulder felt like tiny needles poking her skin.
